CustomField.description: This acknowledgement email body is used in place of the standard in the "one-step" case, that is, when the applicant may proceed directly to a pending proposal application form after profile submission.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This acknowledgement email body is used in place of the standard in the "one-step" case, that is, when the applicant may proceed directly to a pending proposal application form after profile submission.
CustomField.label: Form Phrase ack email body one-step
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Forms (Form Phrase ack email body one-step)
